events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product does not match my order at all.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery reported by the customer.
Assigning the case to refund specialist team to handle the customer's refund request efficiently.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’ll assist you with your refund process right away.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with the order confirmation so we can verify and proceed?
I have attached the photos of the item and the order confirmation as requested. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email within 24 hours.
I appreciate your quick response and look forward to receiving the refund confirmation soon. Thank you for your help.
The refund has been processed and should appear on your payment method within 5 business days. Let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure your refund went through successfully and that you are satisfied with the resolution we provided.
Since the refund was received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
